Class ContentItem

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Object model description of a single content item object.

      • getString

        public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String codeName)
        Convenience method to get the value of a Text or Rich text element without traversing the Elements map.
        Parameters:
        codeName - the element codeName to get the value of
        Returns:
        The value of the element. Returns null if the element does not exist, or if it is not a TextElement or RichTextElement

      • getAssets

        public java.util.List<Asset> getAssets(java.lang.String codeName)
        Convenience method to get the value of an Assets element without traversing the Elements map.
        Parameters:
        codeName - the element codeName to get the Asset list of
        Returns:
        A list of Asset objects. Returns an empty collection if the element does not exist, or if it is not an AssetsElement

      • getModularContent

        public ContentItem getModularContent(java.lang.String codeName)
        Convenience method to retrieve the ContentItem of modular content.
        Parameters:
        codeName - the ContentItem codeName
        Returns:
        The ContentItem. Returns null if it was not included in the response.
